= Revision 0.4.1 - Release Notice =
28th May 2009

Revision 0.4.1 is a minor update for Extensions documentation and minor fixes

= Details =

 * *File revision numbering* - Version 0.4.1 is contained in `juice-0.4.js` and `juice.js`.
 * *Extensions Documentation* - Simple usage documentation added to published extension files.
 * *Safari JSLoad Defect fix* - Fix to occasional problem in Safari, where Juice failed to identify script file loadings and hence stalled at start up.
